channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 4 Takeaways From No. 5 UConn's 71-63 Win Over Texas
item.description: Here are four takeaways from the Huskies earning their sixth-straight win after beating the Longhorns on Friday.

item.title: Jayden Ross goes FLYING for huge poster, extending UConn's lead over Texas
item.description: Jayden Ross went UP for huge poster, extending UConn's lead over Texas.

item.title: UConn's Solo Ball drains logo 3-pointer to beat shot clock vs. Texas
item.description: UConn Huskies' Solo Ball drained a logo 3-pointer to beat the shot clock vs. the Texas Longhorns.

item.title: Indiana's Curt Cignetti Wins Coach of the Year Award for 2nd Straight Season
item.description: A year after winning the award for the first time, Cignetti delivered an encore after leading the Hoosiers to the greatest season in program history.

item.title: Texas Longhorns vs. No. 5 UConn Huskies Highlights | FOX College Hoops
item.description: Check out the best highlights between the Texas Longhorns and UConn Huskies.

item.title: What is dry needling and what happened to T.J. Watt? Answering key questions
item.description: Is dry needling common for NFL players? How long will the Steelers star be sidelined? Here's what we know.

item.title: Sources: Hoosiers DC Haines gets lucrative deal
item.description: Indiana has reached an agreement with defensive coordinator Bryant Haines that will make him one of the nation's highest-paid assistants, sources conf...

item.title: MLB winter meetings winners, losers and head-scratching moves
item.description: We debate our favorite (and least favorite) moves of the week -- and what's ahead.

item.title: Who is willing to spend to keep up with the Dodgers and Blue Jays this winter?
item.description: Baseball insiders were abuzz over L.A. and Toronto at this week's winter meetings, as both have the money -- and pull -- to dominate the winter.

item.title: Mendoza adds to honors, scores Maxwell, O'Brien
item.description: Indiana's Fernando Mendoza captured the Maxwell Award as the nation's player of the year and the Davey O'Brien Award as top quarterback Friday night.
